de.weltraumschaf.groundzero

Class SupressionGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.weltraumschaf.groundzero.SupressionGenerator

  • public class SupressionGenerator
extends Object
    Generates a suppression XML for a report.
    Author:
    Sven Strittmatter
